docs.snippet: N.F.L. Commissioner Roger Goodell said that the power failure at the Superdome was not caused by the halftime show and that it would it not affect New Orleans’s ability to host future Super Bowls....
docs.lead_paragraph: N.F.L. Commissioner Roger Goodell said that the power failure at the Superdome was not caused by the halftime show and that it would it not affect New Orleans’s ability to host future Super Bowls.
docs.abstract: Investigation continues into power failure at New Orleans Superdome, which remains one of the oddest moments in Super Bowl history; NFL commissioner Roger Goodell dismisses notion that incident would hurt city's chances of future host bids.

headline.seo: Super Bowl Power Failure Still Largely Unexplained
headline.main: Out of Darkness, Springing Into Action
headline.print_headline: Out of Darkness, Springing Into Action
